title: 96/456/EC: Commission Decision of 22 July 1996 amending Decision 94/984/EC laying down animal health conditions and veterinary certificates for the importation of fresh poultrymeat from third countries (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 22 July 1996 amending Decision 94/984/EC laying down animal health conditions and veterinary certificates for the importation of fresh poultrymeat from third countries (Text with EEA relevance) (96/456/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Decision shall apply from 1 August 1996.
However, for a period of 60 days following the day of application of this Decision, the Member States shall authorize the importation of fresh poultry meat from China which was produced and certified in accordance with the provisions in force before that day.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 July 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
